changelog:
new:
- Added animations to QS tiles
- Added interpolators to QS tile animations   
- Extended audio panel 
- Audio panel location
- Three-fingers-swipe to screenshot
- Switch back to Camera2

fixed:
- Fixed property setting with failure
- Fixed full nav gestures

Improvements:
- Cleaned Sim Dialog layout
- Modified connecitvity rematch logic to support MSIM devices
- Added HDMI hotplug handling
- Support fonts from Substratum theme packages
- Updated translations

Kernel:
- upstreamed kernel to .146
- kernel built with DragonTC 8.0
- updated touch firmware from 8.12.20
